devdoc.author: Gabriele Rigo - <gab@rigoblock.com>

params.actions: Array of tuples of proposed actions.

devdoc.title: Governance adapter - A helper contract for interacting with governance.

castVote(uint256,uint8).notice: Allows a pool to vote on a proposal.

execute(uint256).notice: Allows a pool to execute a proposal.

propose((address,bytes,uint256)[],string.notice: Allows to make a proposal to the Rigoblock governance.
